data.title: Denmark, Sweden & Norway
data.meta_description: From the natural beauty of western Norway to the world’s biggest small town, Stockholm, to the warm vibes of Copenhagen, Scandinavia is Europe’s best kept secret.
data.text:
Review

5 out of 5 stars

Anonymous traveler, traveled in Jul 2024

The Scandinavia trip was amazing and I wish I didn’t have to leave! Our tour guide Marco was excellent and made the trip so much fun with his recommendations.

Bucket List Trip

5 out of 5 stars

Traveler Hailey, traveled in Jul 2024

My first EF trip. This trip was my bucket list trip & did not disappoint; from the views, the food, the culture, & everything else! Our tour guide, Marco, was kind, knowledgeable, & very well organized. I would HIGHLY recommend this trip. I definitely have the travel bug now &...

Amazing

5 out of 5 stars

Anonymous traveler, traveled in Jul 2024

This trip was amazing. The countries and trip itself exceeded any expectations I had. Each city was beautiful and very different from one another. Our tour guide, Marco, was absolutely amazing and so funny and kind. He was great at directing us the whole time and offered great...

Sensational Scandinavia

5 out of 5 stars

Traveler Kira, traveled in Jul 2024

I had no idea what to expect when I went on this trip. But it was one of the most chillest European trips I have been on to date. Went with a really good crew and our tour director Mira was super organized and very engaging! If you do not have Scandinavia on your list of places...
